# Here are some plots

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
library(rnoaa)

```

```{r}
data("ny_noaa")
nydat_filtered <- ny_noaa %>%
  filter(!is.na(tmax),    # Keep only records with valid max temperature
         !is.na(tmin),    # Keep only records with valid min temperature
         !is.na(prcp),    # Keep only records with valid precipitation
         id == "USW00094728",  # Filter for a specific weather station
         date >= as.Date("1990-01-01") & date <= as.Date("1990-12-31"))  # Filter for a specific time period
```
